title: One-Skillet Garlicky Salmon & Broccoli
description: Rich in omega-3 fatty acids and antioxidants, this dish supports heart health while providing a balanced, nutrient-packed meal in under 20 minutes.
ingredients: 2 salmon fillets (skin on or off, as preferred)
Red pepper flakes (optional, for a little heat)

instructions.title: Prepare the Salmon
steps: Pat the salmon fillets dry with paper towels.
Season both sides with salt and pepper.

instructions.title: Sear the Salmon
steps: Heat 1 tbsp olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Place salmon skin-side down (if using skin), and sear for 4-5 minutes.
Flip and cook the other side for another 3-4 minutes until golden and cooked through.
Remove salmon from skillet and set aside.

instructions.title: Cook the Broccoli
steps: In the same skillet, add the remaining 1 tbsp olive oil and butter.
Toss in the minced garlic and sauté for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add broccoli florets, season with salt, and stir-fry for 4-5 minutes until tender-crisp.

instructions.title: Combine & Finish
steps: Return salmon to the skillet, nestling it among the broccoli.
Squeeze fresh lemon juice over everything and sprinkle with lemon zest.
Optional: add a pinch of red pepper flakes for spice.

instructions.title: Serve Hot
steps: Serve straight from the skillet for a rustic look.
Pair with rice, quinoa, or crusty bread if desired.

title: Garlic Butter Chicken with Broccoli
description: Garlic Butter Chicken with Broccoli is a quick and tasty stir-fry dish made with tender chicken, fresh broccoli, garlic, butter, and a light soy-based sauce. It's flavorful, easy to cook in under 30 minutes, and perfect to serve with rice or noodles for a complete meal.
ingredients: 2 chicken breasts (boneless, skinless, cut into bite-size pieces)

instructions.title: Prepare the Chicken
steps: Season chicken pieces with salt and pepper.

instructions.title: Cook the Chicken
steps: Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium-high heat.
Add chicken and cook for 5-7 minutes until golden brown and fully cooked.
Remove from pan and set aside.

instructions.title: Cook the Broccoli
steps: In the same pan, add butter.
Add garlic and sauté for 1 minute until fragrant.
Add broccoli and stir well.
Pour in chicken broth and cover the pan. Steam for 3-4 minutes until broccoli is tender but still crisp.

instructions.title: Combine & Season
steps: Return chicken to the pan.
Add soy sauce and mix everything together.
Cook for another 2 minutes so flavors combine.

instructions.title: Serve
steps: Sprinkle chili flakes (optional).
Serve hot with steamed rice or noodles.
